text: Dogu gidee bolo digaula hagalee taele i di ala e donu, be di tonu o di Longo Humalia, gei au ga helekai gi Peter i mua digaula huogodoo, “Goe tangada donu o Jew, gei goe e mouli di mouli o tangada tuadimee, hagalee mouli i di mouli tangada o Jew. Malaa, e hai behee go dau hai dela e mahimahi ang gi digau tuadimee bolo gii hai be digau o Jew?”
